Package com.array64.socialCredit.api

Interface SocialCreditConfig

public interface SocialCreditConfig
Parameters for the social credit system.

An instance of this can be gotten using SocialCreditSystem.getConfig().

All modifications of this instance will be saved and will apply even after the server restarts.

Warning: All methods must be called on the main thread.

  • Method Details

    • setMaxScore

      void setMaxScore(int maxScore) throws ScoreOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the maximum social credit score a player can have to maxScore. You may need to call SocialCreditSystem.refreshAll() after to see changes.

      If the default score is greater than maxScore, it is set to maxScore.

      Warning: This method must be called on the main thread.

      Parameters:
      maxScore - The maximum score a player will have
      Throws:
      ScoreOutOfBoundsException - if maxScore is negative
      See Also:
      • getMaxScore()

    • getMaxScore

      int getMaxScore()

      Warning: This method must be called on the main thread.

      Returns:
      The maximum social credit score a player can have
      See Also:
      • setMaxScore(int)

    • setDefaultScore

      void setDefaultScore(int defaultScore) throws ScoreOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the default score that players will get when they first join the server. This doesn't affect players who have already joined the server at least once.

      Warning: This method must be called on the main thread.

      Parameters:
      defaultScore - The default score that should be set
      Throws:
      ScoreOutOfBoundsException - if defaultScore is negative or greater than getMaxScore()
      See Also:
      • getDefaultScore()

    • getDefaultScore

      int getDefaultScore()

      Warning: This method must be called on the main thread.

      Returns:
      The default score that players will get when they first join the server
      See Also:
      • setDefaultScore(int)

    • enable

      void enable()
      Enables the social credit system. This reverts everything that disable() does.

      Warning: This method must be called on the main thread.

      See Also:
      • disable()
      • isEnabled()

    • disable

      void disable()
      Disables the social credit system.

      When disabled:

      • All listeners of the social credit system are disabled.
      • Permissions are no longer actively changed based on a player's score.
      • The social credit scores of players don't show up
      • All built-in commands relating to the social credit system are disabled except for the command to enable it again.
      • API calls can still be made and will work as normal.

      Warning: This method must be called on the main thread.

      See Also:
      • enable()
      • isEnabled()

    • isEnabled

      boolean isEnabled()

      Warning: This method must be called on the main thread.

      Returns:
      true if the social credit system is enabled, otherwise false. By default, the social credit system is enabled.
      See Also:
      • enable()
      • disable()
